comment: Dr. Harper is soo kind and super into the content making it more enjoyable. It's very discussion-heavy so just make sure you read what he assigned. There is only one major paper and he gives you plenty of time and feedback to work on it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Dr. Harper is very kind and caring, which made even the most boring of readings more engaging because I always wanted to understand what he was talking about. He was able to explain complex topics (ancient rhetoric) and facilitate heated discussions very well. Reading was difficult due to the nature of it, but he made good connections
I took 1102, but Dr. Harper was amazing. He was so caring and willing to work with every student. Take this class if you love to read the classics, especially poetry.

I really enjoyed Dr. Harper's online composition class. He is very responsive and loves meeting with his students virtually. He gave great feedback on all papers and assignments and was a generally enjoyable instructor. I would take classes with him again

Prof. Harper is a great teacher. He loves a class that talks back, overall easy going guy! He does take attendance, so showing up is most definitely key. As long as you put in work and participate you should pass his class with flying colors! ( very few assignments and essays assigned overall)

Prof. Harper was a great first english class. I would take him again for 1102 if I could but he does not teach it. Nice man, gives good feedback on your papers, there are lots of reading responses with a lot of questions but they're easy. Also, gives you extra credit opportunities.
